examples.example: 冬天虽然寒冷，但却有着独特的美丽和温馨。

translate.english: Although winter is cold, it has unique beauty and warmth.

examples.example: 冬天的雪花纷纷扬扬，给世界带来了一片银装素裹的纯净之美。

translate.english: The snowflakes in winter are falling profusely and disorderly, bringing a pure beauty of being wrapped in white to the world.

examples.example: 冬天是个充满希望的季节，我们可以在雪地里尽情玩耍，享受欢乐时光。

translate.english: Winter is a season full of hope. We can play heartily in the snow and enjoy the happy time.
